text: Jaba unīharūlē āphnō sāmāna khōlē, taba āphnō rakama tyahīm̐ rahēkō pā'ē, juna unīharūlā'ī nai pharkā'idi'i'ēkō thiyō. Bhanna thālē hē pitā jī! Aba hāmīlā'ī aru kē cāhincha? Hērnusa hāmrō āphnō rakama pani pharkā'idi'i'ēkō cha. Hāmī āphnō ghara parivārakō lāgi khādyān'ya lyā'unē chauṁ, ra āphnō bhā'ikō surakṣā garnēchauṁ. Ra ēka ūm̐ṭabharī khādyānna baṛhī lyā'unēchauṁ. Ra yō lyā'una dhērai sajilō cha
